definitions.definition: The second-lightest chemical element ( symbol He ), with an atomic number of 2 and atomic weight of 4.002602, a colorless , odorless and inert noble gas .
A form or sample of the element.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The second-lightest chemical element ( symbol He ), with an atomic number of 2 and atomic weight of 4.002602, a colorless , odorless and inert noble gas .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A form or sample of the element.
